Name: Grid Tales
About the game: A real-time strategy game with different game modes, such as VS PC, PVP LAN and steam lobby, etc, different elements, such as war simulation, adventure RPG, etc, new game mode and map will be continuously updated, The story background is a variety of myths and legends, with simple operation and interesting characters.
